features: 【Super mini spy camera wifi】Wifi spy camera Diameter: Diameter 1.55 inch and Height is 0.66 inch, Weight 0.63 ounces, Now it is the smallest wifi camera on the Amazon market
【Excellent Function】①Remotely Viewing anywhere ②HD 1080P ③150°wide angle④Support up to 64GB SD card (not included) ⑤1.5 hours built-in battery life ⑥Automatic night vision (non-luminance)

【3 Recording Modes】①Remote Monitoring by APP (Need 2.4G WIFI) Connect the camera to your home wifi by APP, you can watch and record the real-time video anywhere; ②24 Hours loop recording on SD Card; ③Camera Hotspot Connect by APP, please note distance of the phone and camera is within 5M)

【365 days support and Warranty】Because the complex functions of the product, many people can't easily install it, please refer instruction video and Manual, please ask us for help first, we will definitely reply to your message within 24 hours.

【Upgraded Intelligent Motion Detection Alarm & Auto Night Vision】When going out, you can receive warning messages in your phone when motion is detected and you can set the sensor sensitivity manually (Low/Medium/High/Max) to help prevent false alarms. The device features 6 infrared IR lights (non-luminance), The night vision function will turn on automatically once the environment getting dim.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Motion Sensor, Portable, Night Vision, Image Sensor, Local Recording

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Only need two steps to complete the installation: Download APPBind the cameraThis Mini Spy Camera does NOT support 5GHz Wi-Fi

1080 HD Night Vision This small wireless camera uses an advanced 2.0MP image sensor 1080P HD live videos. Even shooting in the dark is still clearly visible. Motion Detection The camera app will send push notifications to your devices when movement is detected, these real-time alerts let you know immediately what's happening so you can act quickly. Micro SD Card Loop Recording Simply insert a micro SD card 128GB Max (not included) to record without Wi-Fi like a regular camera. It will start loop recording by default. 360° Rotatable Base The package comes with a magnetic rotatable base, you can easily adjust the camera’s viewing angle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Value for what you get is great. Motiom sensor has to be set to low sensitivity because a simple light change triggers mine. I have mine stuck under my bed, really hard to see if you turn of indicator lights. App runs and records well. I do wish it had an automatic record feature when it has a motion alarm.UPDATE: Camera stop notifying me of motions, although it logged them. Eventually the camera casually disconnected and now I'm unable to find it again after many attempts. I don't understand how this could just casually happen. Maybe the company does not do well with updates and/or feedback.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality, accurate motion detection.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this nanny cam to keep an eye on The woman I hired to care for my pets while went on vacation. The piece of mind this camera offers is priceless.Impressively compact, completely inconspicuous and easy to hide in plain sight.It has a great viewing angle and the APP connected with my iPhone 12 Seamlessly~ It’s fun to use and easy to navigate.Motion detection is accurate and notifies me nearly instantly when it picks up movement.But, Most importantly the Picture quality is really good and it has an awesome viewing angle!I’m very happy with this camera~ I would buy it again if need be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great Size, but able to access videos ONLY on app
reviews.reviewText: This appears to be a great camera, as it's a small size, easy to place anywhere. The magnetic attachment is fairly strong (stronger than others I've had). The instructions aren't the best (incomplete at best), but after playing around with it for a bit, I was able to figure out how to get it to record. Didn't try night vision, but the motion detection alerts are nice (notifications can be turned off in app). The ability to turn off the flashing indicator light (in app), is a nice function as well.However, here's where the cons come into play: 1. Couldn't get it to record without using the FOWL app. 2. Unable to save/access videos on sd card. The videos show they're on the sd card in the app, but when inserting sd card into computer, it only has write protected files of the camera, no videos. 3. The FOWL app requires a username and password, but anybody with access to your phone can access the app without knowing either. Even if you log out of the app, when you go back into it, your username is auto-populated (fields will not remain blank). All anyone has to do is click 'log in' and they're in.I like the design/look of the camera, but I just can't get it to record video onto the sd card. Might be user error, defect etc, but this isn't going to work for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won't connect properly
reviews.reviewText: Worked with it for a few days but not able to get it to work. Randomly shut off and not connecting. When it did connect I couldn't get and video or picture from it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for most areas
reviews.reviewText: I tried this out and was impressed with the motion detection ability, picture quality, and the night vision. It is just a little difficult to set up because it doesn't tell you anywhere that it takes a while to load. I had to start over several times because I didn't think it was working or I was doing something wrong. After I discovered it just took a while to load everything was fine. I even added another device to watch the camera and it was easy to load. I might be making another purchase for another area.

reviews.reviewerName: I’m not satisfied because I did not get what I ordered
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Battery lasts less than an hour
reviews.reviewText: Sadly, the battery lasted less than an hour before needing to be recharged. When it is at 30% battery life it would drop the wifi connection and stop showing a picture. Overall the picture wasn’t bad even in the dark. I purchased this to put in a lizard cage to so I could watch without them seeing me, but unfortunately the view was narrower than I was needing. At 24” above the floor of the enclosure I could only see about half of the 18” x 18” floor. Returned

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Time stamps wrong, duplicates, videos won't play
reviews.reviewText: The time stamps are very often way off, there always duplicates So i see rhe same.clip twice but with very different time stamps, and I paid for cloud storage and idk how long it lasts because videos from the days before won't play. Poor image quality = constant movement of pixels so woth jight vision you often have to pause and zoom to discern if its movement of the image bouncing around.. The app is easily hacked apparently because every time there is evidence of trespassing, that footage is gone. Only that footage, and every time. Pointless waste of money. I would never buy this again
